VANTIN: I was given Vantin 100mg twice daily after being on IV antibiotics for 4 days.  I actually quit them due to being so sick and visiting my doctor. My doctor switched me to levaquin, which I found out was poison and was having side effects after 8 days of it, plus it wasn't helping my infection.  I decided to take the Vantin after quitting levaquin and my symptoms have imoroved.  I still have kidney pain, but my fever is gone.

The IV medication, which is in the same class as Vantin worked the best.  I had a bad doctor at the hospital that took me off the IV antibiotics early.  I will use Vantin again if needed for UTI/kidney infection.
Now I hope I do not have permanent damaging effects from the leviquin.
